issue.title: [Rust] Fix or ignore 1.51 clippy lints
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12116](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12116). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Rust 1.51 introduces some lints that have broken CI. We can either fix or ignore them, depending on the amount of time it'll take to fix them.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12116?focusedCommentId=17310092) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9815
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9815>
